item.title: Illegal turns onto hoxton market, 13th February
item.description:
The turn right from nuttal st onto hoxton st is very dangerous. cars are unable to turn left onto hoxton st market so they turn right and just do u turns in the middle of a busy road. this happens everytime i go past and nearly got hita few times

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoxton Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bedroom furniture has been dumped on pavement, 13th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Love Walk, Camberwell, Greater London

item.title: Damage to grass verge., 13th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Maylands Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Gulley, 13th February

item.title: Household waste dumped from moving car., 13th February
item.description:
I picked up what I could with helpful ambulance driver and put in my bin. Cars were driving over the broken glass which might cause burst tyres, tho we picked up as much broken glass as we could find. There were even unopened tins of food ðŸ˜± V dangerous as I had to pick up in the road but car drivers v good. Now blowing down the road. Prob needs a street cleaner to sort. Sorry didn't take a photo
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Elmers End Road, Upper Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
